title: D1 Jungle main L/F serious Diamond/Masters Team
body:
IGN: Selfz
Main champs : J4, vi, lee, elise, panth
Timezone: est
Available: Monday 8am-2pm Tuesday- ALL day Wends-8 am-2pm Thurs-ALL day Friday-ALL day Weekends- lmk ahead of time.
Call making: I usually make the calls in every team i am on. A lot of experience doing it.
Looking for a serious diamond team prefer if all the players are mains in there roles meaning top 3 champs are literally according to their role.. prefer all players to be at least d3 and above and also be serious about a season 5 team. You can add me in game and msg me there.
